__e: His mother's at the dentist... he's at home alone, and she's with him!
I'm a dentist, and when people need it, that's great.
Now, you say you have no part in that... that your work is internal, with the dentist and everyone sees you charging people down in the street!
He's Mama's dentist, who else should I go to?
What if I told your dentist not to work on you for six months?
I'm not doing what you're doing, Mike, and I'm just your fucking nobody dentist.
Who needs a dental bot anyway, man?
- Can't some other dentist do it?
Sure, i'd seen him around. It would never have occurred to me to walk up to the dentist and say, "are you interested in this?"
